post.title: Shadowsocks中转方案(简易版本)
post.body:
---
把61.97.1.1改为你的目的地节点地址
把122.228.1.1改为你的国内节点地址
`iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING  -m udp -p udp --dport 1000:65535 -j DNAT --to-destination 61.97.1.1:1000-65535`
`iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -m udp -p udp --dport 1000:65535 -d 61.97.1.1 -j SNAT --to-source 122.228.1.1`
`iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING  -m tcp -p tcp --dport 1000:65535 -j DNAT --to-destination 61.97.1.1:1000-65535`
`iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -m tcp -p tcp --dport 1000:65535 -d 61.97.1.1 -j SNAT --to-source 122.228.1.1`

post.title: Congratulations!
post.body: Your zeronet blog has been successfully created!
